[[Naruto]] creates a [[shadow clone]] that grabs and flings him to a distant point of the player's choosing. This technique is not meant for combat purposes, being only a method used in ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm]]'' to get around the [[Konoha]] hub faster. As players progress in the game, Naruto's [[chakra]] reserves become larger and he can be thrown further.
